segments.text: So you said you and Amanda met through a mutual friend . How did it happen ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , my roommate was friends with Amanda , so he introduced us .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Did he tell you what she was like first ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , he described her to me , and she sounded like my type .
segments.speaker: S2
